about_the_game: This is a demo for the game Soakraiva, which is an adult only pixel-art exploration platformer. The demo does not contain much exploration. Demo saves are incompatible with the full game.

content_descriptors.notes: Soakraiva demo contains explicit non-consensual sex with various alien creatures.
